#labels Phase-Deploy
# How to run

= Getting started =

  # Download the zip file from the downloads section
  # Unzip it
  # Enable the SCGI handler for .groovy files in your web server (see WebServerInstallation)
  # Run GroovyRun. (java -jar GroovyLamp.jar -port=4444, change port to be the same as in the SCGI configuration)
  # Copy the test.groovy file to your web server's doc root
  # Restart your web server
  # Navigate to /test.groovy in your browser!
